block.field: # Must be much less than half "ConnectTimeout" value .
Enumerate your servers and jump hosts here.
#Aggressively disconnects quickly. Comment if margins insufficient for high-latency.
Returns true if connected to specified subnet. Enables direct connection to local static IP address.
# May prefer port "2022" or similar if domain is shared by NAT.

block.comment: Daemon commands. Do not define unless multi-gateway redundancy is needed. Tor services redundancy is expected to be far more reliable than such fallbacks.
Hooks "_setup_ssh" after other operations complete. Typically used to install special files (eg. machine specific keys).
